reviewText: Very good copy of Wild Bill... Super quality.... "God Forgives"... Not so much.. I don't know why I can't find a decent copy of this movie... The best one I have ever seen was on Encore Western Channel... I would love to see that one available..

I recently purchased other titles from TGG direct and amazon.com such as "the Mercenary/God's Gun" and "Death Rides A Horse/A Reason To Live, A Reason To Die", both sets were of somewhat obscure spaghetti westerns, but the transfers were great looking. The picture was pristine and the image widescreen, so I was excited when I saw that the Terence Hill-Bud Spencer movie "God Forgives...I Don't" was being issued by the same good people. However, my enthusiasm turned to disappointment once I started to watch the disc, the picture quality was pretty poor and it was pan and scanned to boot. I will have to be more hesitant with any future releases coming from TGG direct, which saddens and frustrates me.
